attributes.action: exempt all job-skills training courses from VAT for job seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the lack of Government funded training available to the growing number of job seekers, many individuals are seeking to pay for their own job-skills training to improve their chances of securing work. This can be very expensive, especially for someone who is between jobs; but insult is added to injury when the Government adds an extra 15% on for itself.
